metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4350 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in Fullscreen in Google Chrome on Androidprior to 116.0.5845.96 allowed a remote attacker to potentially spoof thecontents of the Omnibox (URL bar) via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
